description:
The whole college admission process in India is a never ending circus that begins every year around this time. Admission time stress happens to all students who dream of studying further in life and achieving success. Some colleges have a 100% cut off while some want Rs 100 lakh in donations. Some colleges want you to protest wearing saffron clothes while some demand that you speak impeccable English.
Watch this video and tell us about your admission problems!

We all know THAT one guy. The guy who has Big Biceps, a good Beard and a great smile.The guy who is not only a part-time model but also an MBA graduate from IIM. The guy who has 10 thousand followers on Instagram and gets 10 new matches on Tinder every time he unlocks his iPhone X. The guy who can date any girl he wants, but still chooses to talk to your Girlfriend every day.
Watch this video and tell us about your Girlfriend’s annoyingly good-looking guy best friend!

Appraisal Day.
Expectation - The one time in the year when you show your boss all the projects you've completed, the weekends you've worked and the good work done so that he gives you a deserved pay rise.
Reality - The day when your boss gets to recall all your office mistakes, leaves taken and power naps so that he doesn't have to give you a raise.
Show this video to your fellow employees and boss and get your appraisal done soon!

Brother, bhai, anna, bantai. Many terms, but they all describe the same Bro. This guy always has your back, be it 3 am or 3pm. He'll fight a war for you and always be your wingman. But do you still remember the Bros we had when we were younger? The guys who took us double-seat on cycles and gave proxy attendance for us in school?
This video is a tribute to them.
We might not be in touch, but we still love you bhailog!

Commerce students have it tough in life. Society defines them as students who are too smart for Arts, but at the same time too dumb for Science. Even if a child scores well in his final school years and wants to choose a Commerce education instead of a Science one, his parents convince him against it. Here's our support and message to all the students out there - Do what you want and do it hard, baaki sab gaye Bhaad! 

Spread across 181 countries, ACCA offers a globally-recognised qualification that prepares you
for a career in finance, anywhere in the world.

The UPSC exams in India are a matter of great prestige in India. While lakhs of students study and work hard to clear these, barely a handful manage to pass. Our Raja Rabish Kumar sets out on his latest mission, to find out more about the applicants who give the IAS exam, and to find out what it takes to pass them. Watch this latest report from Rabish SDTV to know!

Superstition in India is nothing new. Black cats, broken mirrors, Nimbu-Mirchi, we do it all. But the everlasting question arises, do these Superstitions actually hold value or are they purely Blind Faith? What if these Superstitions were true every time, how would life turn out?

Cross your fingers, have a spoon of Dahi Shakkar and watch this video to find out!

Everyone has experienced the tantrums of our local Autowalas. The chances of a pretty girl agreeing to your proposal are higher than those of a Rickshaw guy agreeing to take you on a busy Monday evening. Sometimes they ask for extra money, sometimes they scam you by taking a longer route and sometimes they just refuse to take you. But what if in a parallel universe, Office Employees started behaving like Rickshaw walas? What would our Office life be like?
Get in, press the play button, start the meter and let's find out on this trip!

#BreakTheBeard
